changeSet.author: bmandel
changeSet.sql: insert into ALERT.DISTRIBUTION_NOTIFICATION_TYPES (COMMON_DISTRIBUTION_CONFIG_ID, NOTIFICATION_TYPE) select COMMON_DISTRIBUTION_CONFIG_ID, 'RULE_VIOLATION' from ALERT.DISTRIBUTION_NOTIFICATION_TYPES_RELATION left join ALERT.NOTIFICATION_TYPES on DISTRIBUTION_NOTIFICATION_TYPES_RELATION.NOTIFICATION_TYPE_ID = NOTIFICATION_TYPES.ID where NOTIFICATION_TYPES.TYPE = 0

insert into ALERT.DISTRIBUTION_NOTIFICATION_TYPES (COMMON_DISTRIBUTION_CONFIG_ID, NOTIFICATION_TYPE) select COMMON_DISTRIBUTION_CONFIG_ID, 'RULE_VIOLATION_CLEARED' from ALERT.DISTRIBUTION_NOTIFICATION_TYPES_RELATION left join ALERT.NOTIFICATION_TYPES on DISTRIBUTION_NOTIFICATION_TYPES_RELATION.NOTIFICATION_TYPE_ID = NOTIFICATION_TYPES.ID where NOTIFICATION_TYPES.TYPE = 1

insert into ALERT.DISTRIBUTION_NOTIFICATION_TYPES (COMMON_DISTRIBUTION_CONFIG_ID, NOTIFICATION_TYPE) select COMMON_DISTRIBUTION_CONFIG_ID, 'POLICY_OVERRIDE' from ALERT.DISTRIBUTION_NOTIFICATION_TYPES_RELATION left join ALERT.NOTIFICATION_TYPES on DISTRIBUTION_NOTIFICATION_TYPES_RELATION.NOTIFICATION_TYPE_ID = NOTIFICATION_TYPES.ID where NOTIFICATION_TYPES.TYPE = 2

insert into ALERT.DISTRIBUTION_NOTIFICATION_TYPES (COMMON_DISTRIBUTION_CONFIG_ID, NOTIFICATION_TYPE) select COMMON_DISTRIBUTION_CONFIG_ID, 'VULNERABILITY' from ALERT.DISTRIBUTION_NOTIFICATION_TYPES_RELATION left join ALERT.NOTIFICATION_TYPES on DISTRIBUTION_NOTIFICATION_TYPES_RELATION.NOTIFICATION_TYPE_ID = NOTIFICATION_TYPES.ID where NOTIFICATION_TYPES.TYPE = 3 or NOTIFICATION_TYPES.TYPE = 4 or NOTIFICATION_TYPES.TYPE = 5 or NOTIFICATION_TYPES.TYPE = 6
